text:
Application for Experienced professional recruitment
                                                                           
BALAMURUGAN SERAN SENGUTTUVANBALAMURUGAN SERAN SENGUTTUVAN
TESTING AND COMMISSIONING ENGINEER                               
Email: balamurugan.seran@gmail.com
Contact No: +91 9551204517Contact Address
106/221 Suriya Narayanan Street,
Royapuram,
Chennai – 600013.
CAREER PROFILE
Objective
With a strong belief in the saying “Ability develops and reveals itself with every new assignment”, I would
be glad to work in a competitive environment helping me to explore my ability and potential to the best in
turn contributing to the growth of the organization.
Profile Summary
Previous Organization      :  Sodexo India Pvt. Ltd.
Designation                     :  Floor Maintenance Engineer
Period                             :  From October 2011 to January 2013
 Current Organization      :  PDCS PROJECTS INDIA Pvt. Ltd.
Designation                     :  Testing And Commissioning Engineer
Period                             :  From April 2013 To July 2016
Nature Of Work 
Testing and commissioning of all kind of protective relays of ALSTOM, ABB and SCHNEIDER make.
Design and making of settings calculations for protection relays.
Testing and commissioning of all Electrical equipment’s in 11KV, 33KV, 66KV, 220KV, 400KV and 765KV
systems.
Inspection of Control and relay panel, preparation of test report and cable schedule for sub-station and
power plant.
Testing and Commissioning of Control and Relay panel for Bus bar, Transformer, Generator, Motor, Bus
coupler and Line Feeder.
Knowledge  of  Transformer  protection,  Reactor  protection,  Busbar  protection,  Motor  protection  and
Synchronizing Scheme.
Testing of Power Control Centre and Motor Control Centre.
Testing of CT, VT, CVT, Circuit Breaker, Switch Gear and Power Transformer.
Trouble shooting of all Electrical Circuits, Control Circuits and Protection Circuits.
 Domestic Assignment For Power Plants And Substations 
1.Testing and Commissioning of 400/220KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for RRVPNL at Bikaner, Rajasthan.
2.Testing and Commissioning of 400/220KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for RRVPNL at Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.
3.Testing and commissioning of 60MW Power station, testing of Line feeder relays and Motor protection
relays of ALSTOM and Siemens for TCPL at Karaikudi, Tamilnadu.
4.Testing and commissioning of 33/6.6KV Switchgear, PMCC panel scheme checking and testing of P&B
Vision relay for feeder protection and Bus coupler for FLSmidth at Asansol, West Bengal.
5.Testing and commissioning of 33KV /415V Switchgear, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
configuration of Feeder protection relays of SCHNEIDER for Adani Power Corporation at Visakhapatnam,
Andhra Pradesh.
6.Testing and commissioning of 200MW Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing
of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for GMR Power Corporation at Basin Bridge, Chennai.
7.Testing and Commissioning of  7MW Solar  Power plant , RMU panel scheme checking and testing of CT,
VT, CB and ABB Feeder Protection relays for Welspun India at Bellary , Karnataka.
8.Testing and Commissioning of 765/400 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM and ABB for PGCIL at Satna, Madhya Pradesh.
9.Testing and Commissioning of 220 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing
of Line feeder relays of ALSTOM for MSETCL at Akola, Maharashtra.
10.Testing and Commissioning of 400/220 KV Substation , Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder and transformer feeder relays of ALSTOM  for MSETCL at Ghatodi , Maharashtra.
11.Testing and Commissioning of 400/220 KV Substation, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder, transformer and reactor protection relays of ALSTOM for PGCIL at Khandwa,
Maharashtra.
12.Testing and commissioning of 60MW Power station, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing
of Motor Protection Relay of ABB make for Hi-tech Carbon at Gummidipoondi, Chennai.
13.Testing and Commissioning of 200MW Thermal Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking
and testing of Line Protection Relay of ABB make for NTPC at Koradi, Bihar.
14.Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation, Control and Relay panel scheme modification and
testing of Line Protection relays of ABB make for BBMB & DTL at Narela, Haryana.
15.Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation, Control and Relay panel scheme modification and
testing of Line Protection relays of ABB make for BBMB at Samaypur, Haryana.
16.Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation , Control and Relay panel scheme modification and
testing of Line Protection relays of ABB make for BBMB at Bhakra Right Bank power House, Himachal
Pradesh.
17.Retrofitting and Commissioning of 200 KV substation , Control and Relay panel scheme modification and
testing of Line Protection relays of ABB make for BBMB at Bhakra Left Bank power House, Himachal
Pradesh.
18.Testing and commissioning of 15MW Solar Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder and transformer relays of ALSTOM make for Jayashree Electromech at NTPC,
Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh.
19.Testing and commissioning of 100MW Solar Power plant, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line feeder, transformer and Twin feeders of ABB make relays for Enrich Energy Pvt. Ltd at
Zaheerabad, Telangana.
20.Testing  and  commissioning  of  765/400/220  KV  PGCIL  substation,  control  and  relay  panel  scheme
- 2 -checking and testing of Line, transformer and reactor relays of Schneider make for L&T India Ltd. At
Gwalior, Uttar Pradesh.
21.Testing  and  commissioning  of  765/400/220  KV  PGCIL  substation,  control  and  relay  panel  scheme
checking and testing of Line, transformer and reactor relays of Schneider make for L&T India Ltd. At
Shikrapur, Pune, Maharashtra.
22.Testing and commissioning of 2X700MW TPP, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing of
Generator, Overall and Overhang differential relays of ALSTOM make for NPL at Rajpura, Punjab.
23.Testing and commissioning of 2X250MW TPP, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing of
Generator, Overall and Overhang differential relays of ALSTOM make for BECL at Bhavnagar, Gujarat.
24.Testing and commissioning of 1X600MW TPP, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and testing of
Generator, Overall and Overhang differential relays of ALSTOM make for JPL at Seoni, Madhya Pradesh.
25.Testing and commissioning of 400/220KV GIS PGCIL, Control and Relay panel scheme checking and
testing of Line, Transformer, Reactor and Busbar protection relays of Alstom make for Alstom Solutions at
Betul, Madhyapradesh.
International Assignment For Substations & Power stations
Factory testing of KNPC SWG, Equipment testing of CT, PT, Bus bar & control and relay scheme checking,
function checking of feeder protection, motor protection, bus bar protection relays of SEL, ABB & Siemens
make relays for KNPC at AL-AHLEILA Factory at Kuwait.
